reviews.tvSnippet:
I've had mobile data contracts through Axxess for a years. For the most part, my interactions with Axxess in this regards was fairly simple and painless.
When I moved to another place, I decided to get fibre through them and cancel the mobile internet. It has been two months and so far all they keep doing is saying that the line is activated, even though no one has bothered to come and install a line to the house. They send me invoices and even deduct money from my card, regardless of there not being any line to the house. To get a refund from them has also been frustrating.
I've tried phoning them, emails and even their text assistant on their website. No one can resolve this and everyone keeps pointing to other departments or say that someone will contact me. No one called.

I don't think its a bad idea to get fibre from them, but for the love of sanity, make sure they don't mess up the address on their end and find out if there no fibre line already active on that address. Also, get a timeline as to when the fibre will be installed and keep following up on the progress, as they never make contact first.
reviews.text:
I've had mobile data contracts through Axxess for a years. For the most part, my interactions with Axxess in this regards was fairly simple and painless.
When I moved to another place, I decided to get fibre through them and cancel the mobile internet. It has been two months and so far all they keep doing is saying that the line is activated, even though no one has bothered to come and install a line to the house. They send me invoices and even deduct money from my card, regardless of there not being any line to the house. To get a refund from them has also been frustrating.
I've tried phoning them, emails and even their text assistant on their website. No one can resolve this and everyone keeps pointing to other departments or say that someone will contact me. No one called.

I don't think its a bad idea to get fibre from them, but for the love of sanity, make sure they don't mess up the address on their end and find out if there no fibre line already active on that address. Also, get a timeline as to when the fibre will be installed and keep following up on the progress, as they never make contact first.

reviews.tvSnippet:
Excellent service which is what saves any situation.
I rely heavily on connectivity and our line speed had been bad for a while. We'd have the line reset, reboot the router, have good speeds and then it would drop shortly after.

On Friday morning I reported the issue via WhatsApp (very convenient!l). After attempting two line resets a ticket was logged at 12:00. At 12:15 I received a call from Marvel with the cause (hight traffic) and a solution (router upgrade). By 13:15 I collected my new router from Marvel at their offices.

Thanks for the continued support with your services.

reviews.tvSnippet: I used to think Axxess was one of the better ISP's out there and used to be happy with their service, but I have grown extremely disappointed in their customer service. They have certainly gone backwards. I now have 2 unresolved tickets that no one even bothers to reply to even when I follow up. Not mentioning their chats where the agents simply drop you. This on top of me experiencing intermittent connectivity and logging faults and complaints. Going on for months now. The only thing keeping me from cancelling was a glimmer of faith in past performance but sadly all trust and confidence have now dissipated. They are officially worse than Telkom and I'll be switching to another ISP.

Having dealt with other providers before, you guys have been a breath of fresh air. Keep up the good work.

reviews.tvSnippet:
We bought a Grandstream handset from Axxess and it‚Äôs BEEN giving us problem for YEARS UPON YEARS. We tried to contact Axxcess to help us with this issue and the phone will receive phone calls for one day and the next day back to not working! It is affecting our business!! This is one of the emails I sent to them:

Good morning,

I hope this email finds you well. We have a SERIOUS ISSUE with your Grandstream handset that we should be using to receive phone calls but instead it does not ring and we only can make phone calls with it. I called your helpline 3 weeks back and spoke to numerous call centre agents and none of them managed to help. A specific agent I spoke to was a lady named Ntombi who managed to get the phone to ring for only one day then after that, it stopped working. I am not the only one from my company who has tried resolving this matter. It has been years upon years with us battling with this particular problem and Axxesss not hearing our demands for a service we pay every month for. We are losing valuable customers because of this and if this continues, we will have to cancel our service with Axxess and get better service and help elsewhere. On July the 11th at 3:31pm one of my co workers sent you the same query message that I am sending today and you did not respond to her email. I have called your helpline more than 15 times and I was put on hold for over 45 mins and they took down my number and said they will call me back but to this day, no one has called me yet. This problem has to be solved, enough is enough!

reviews.tvSnippet: Pathetic service.We have had technicians out to our property every 6 weeks over the past 18 months without them being able to fix the issue!!I had them here on Monday agai and the connection lasted until 11 am yesterday.I immediately logged a call and until now nobody has made contact at all.I work from home and have explained that to the call centre agent but nobody cares.I can understand why it is impossible to get hold of management.

reviews.tvSnippet:
The worst ISP experience I've had in a very long time.
For just over a year I have had countless issues with either intermittent access or days on end without any access at all (strangely each time over a weekend or public holiday (or both).
I gave notice for end October and didn't have access to my WiFi network from  the 29th.  I then discovered that they had CHANGED my WiFi password without my consent or knowledge.  I cannot help but wonder how many times they had done that over the past months, leaving me without access to a network that I had paid for!!
Steer very far away from this company!

reviews.tvSnippet: The worst customer service providers I've ever had the misfortune to deal with. Incompetent, rude and abrupt. Can't resolve your issue so they put you on hold for 1 hour!!! Bye Axxess, this was the last straw. Let's hope Afrihost will be better.

reviews.tvSnippet:
Axxess will lure you in with a promise that they do not believe in contracts and that your subscription with them is on a month-to-month basis and that you can cancel at any time should you not be happy with their services.

They promise ultra fast internet speeds: "Say goodbye to buffering and slow speeds". However, I got EXTREMELY frustrated with VERY slow internet speeds. This was resolved within two days, and I decided to pay my monthly fee of R425-00. However, the next day I was back to "snail pace" internet speeds. After only a week with them, I decided to cancel my subscription.

I distinctly remembered reading the following on their website:
Their answer to the question "Do I need to sign up for a contract?" reads as follows: "No siree! At Axxess, we don't like contracts. All our services are month-to-month and can be easily cancelled if you change your mind."

BUT, when I tried to cancel my internet subscription with Axxess, I was informed I had to pay a cancellation fee of R499-00 should I decide to cancel within the first 6 months after joining them.

When I went back to their web site to read the small print, I saw the following sentence: "*Cancellation fees may apply if signing up on a Promotional offer." I did not sign up for a promotional offer, but STILL they charge a cancellation fee?!? SHARKS!!!
reviews.text:

reviews.tvSnippet:
They have low speeds and unfair FUP (Fair Usage Policy).

I decided to cancel and they offered their useless 3 months retention deal. Half off! Of course I took it and now they won't cancel after the 3 months passes and want to keep me for an additional 2 months.

I struggle with their connection all the time and I thought during this retention period, they would do anything to try and retain me as a customer but nothing has changed thus my request to leave them!

They are liars, they have impossible standards with a weak internet connection and have rigid rules.

Stay away from Axxess at all cost.

reviews.tvSnippet: Got MTN 5G in April 2025 worked well until August 2025. DL speeds were always above 200 Mbps and only dropped below that during some peak hours 18:00 to 21:00. UL speeds were never very good and ranged between 2Mbps and 8Mbps. Since August 2025 the DL speed was throttled to 60 Mbps. I logged a service ticket and it was back to normal for less than a week and the process repeated for about 3 weeks after which my tickets were ignored and the responses changed to the service is not throttled while it is and speed test proof was supplied.

I logged a service ticket and it was back to normal for less than a week and the process repeated for about 3 weeks after which my tickets were ignored and the responses changed to the service is not throttled while it is and speed test proof was supplied.

reviews.text: I waited in the support queue for over 2 hours and 15 minutes, hoping to resolve a simple issue. Unfortunately, not a single problem was addressed and I didn‚Äôt receive any help at all. The long wait felt pointless, and no staff member reached out to assist me or provide updates. Two hours for basic support is unacceptable‚ÄîI wouldn‚Äôt recommend Axxess to anyone based on this experience.

reviews.tvSnippet: I was very disappointed in the service I received. I think I would like to say to anyone wanting to use this provider, first make sure that they really cover your address. I have paid for my router after checking the address to make sure. Only a day after I received a message to say they dont service that specific place and there is no internet lines there. I immediately ask to stop the router delivery because I will obviously not be able  to use it. I asked to get the router refunded, because it wasnt due to my fault. Well I am still waiting for refund.

reviews.tvSnippet:
I reserve 1 star for Home Affairs. But Axxess, you were very very close. Bill me ahead of time for a service but forgot to send the router. Costing me 2 days of work now. Only 1 ticket responded to within 12 hours (to justify billing. I had to phone every time to get an answer.
I've always supported Axxess but since going the 'digital communication' route , you've taken away accountability from your staff. Web Africa did this . Telkom did this. Now you. I left Afrihost for Axxess but I expected more from.
Starting to regret the move (and still without internet)

I've always supported Axxess but since going the 'digital communication' route , you've taken away accountability from your staff. Web Africa did this . Telkom did this. Now you. I left Afrihost for Axxess but I expected more from.

reviews.tvSnippet: Axxess is sometimes great and sometimes thats why i left a 3 star rating if they. Could go an extra mile for their customers they would be the best in SA .. their Live agents are slow but they tend to get the job Done  overall they aren't a Bad Company i prefer them over any company to provide services to you

reviews.tvSnippet:
Terrible Terrible Terrible

They don't go an extra mile for their customers. I logged a fault on the 12th of September about slow to no connection. They resolved it 5 days later, citing a technical fault with vodacom. 4 days later, same problem again. To this day they haven't fixed it. I just asked for an update on their WhatsApp line, the agent tells me "there's no update at this stage" Like, are you kidding me??? Internet is not just for streaming but work and school purposes and they give me that?? Im so tired of them at this point. I paid R699 for services that aren't being rendered. Also, when you choose to leave, they charge R900.
reviews.text:

I just asked for an update on their WhatsApp line, the agent tells me "there's no update at this stage" Like, are you kidding me??? Internet is not just for streaming but work and school purposes and they give me that?? Im so tired of them at this point. I paid R699 for services that aren't being rendered. Also, when you choose to leave, they charge R900.

reviews.tvSnippet: Excellent service from Axxess, but our fibre service provider could improve somewhat! Axxess consultants are always friendly and extremely helpful.
reviews.text: Excellent service from Axxess, but our fibre service provider could improve somewhat! Axxess consultants are always friendly and extremely helpful.

reviews.tvSnippet: Friendly and quick
reviews.text: Friendly and quick

reviews.tvSnippet:
Fast service and to the point. Consultants where very helpful. This was true when we signed up for the service.  Now I will give them a -10. Constant issues with upload and download speed.  IP address issues and all I get is a please hold.  Now feedback, no help, the most useless company ever.  I used free minutes, 30 minutes and a R100 airtime to try and sort out my problems and it is either not their problem or they can't help me or ish sorry I don't know what is going on and if you ask to speak to a supervisor you are put on hold and they never get back to you.
My previous company used only
Axxess as we knew the owners very well and wanted to support a small business, now I will NOT suggest anyone to use them.  Totally pathetic.
I phoned them today again with the same issues that I am having and guess what, I get put on hold after asking to speak to a supervisor.

reviews.tvSnippet: Really love the excellent service from Axxess.. wouldn't hesitate to recommend them! Their pricing is competitive, their service is excellent.
reviews.text: Really love the excellent service from Axxess.. wouldn't hesitate to recommend them! Their pricing is competitive, their service is excellent.

reviews.tvSnippet: I have always had excellent service and help. When I relocated it was handled professionally. They arrived the day they said they would and left the house as if they were never here. I would definitely recommend Axxess to friends and family without a doubt. I work from home so a reliable, fast wifi connection is very important. i am very happy and don't have any complaints. I moved from KZN to WP and what a pleasure to not have to worry about my wifi.
reviews.text: I have always had excellent service and help. When I relocated it was handled professionally. They arrived the day they said they would and left the house as if they were never here. I would definitely recommend Axxess to friends and family without a doubt. I work from home so a reliable, fast wifi connection is very important. i am very happy and don't have any complaints. I moved from KZN to WP and what a pleasure to not have to worry about my wifi.

reviews.tvSnippet: In comparison to previous cellular networks I've used, Axxess by far is the most pleasurable company with absolutely, reliable, prompt & timely service when there is a breakdown or disconnection (which is infrequent) on the internet.  One phonecall is all it takes to get my service back on track working. It's also such a pleasurable experience engaging with courteous & friendly call centre agents who do their absolute best to ensure that the job has been completed & I'm connected  before that call has ended. Well done Axxess!!!!!‚úîÔ∏è

reviews.tvSnippet:
They have good processes in place and are committed to good service and have good support availability. They seem unable to expedite the same good levels of service from their bulk providers like Openserve. Sometimes the support staff struggle to understand subtleties of an issue.

Update: I must downgrade my review. Their service is automated to the point of insanity. Management are invisible and indifferent.  Tech support agents don't look at history and do not apply their minds. They seem to have just about everything that distinguishes them as thinking humans squeezed out of them. Granted they are the subjects in a poorly designed system that leaves them helpless to do much more that serve as a postbox to somewhere else.

reviews.tvSnippet:
This middle man service, is provider dependand.
They can‚Äôt guarantee the service they offer and issues gets escalated to the main provider.

You get about 20% worth of speed but stll pays the full amount.
Completely tower dependant so I would not recommend them at all.

reviews.tvSnippet: Over the past two years the service has been trouble free and moving an account was quick and easy. Much easier to deal with Axxess  than MetroFibre who owns the line.

reviews.tvSnippet: Super easy online purchase. Super-fast delivery and the staff was super-efficient. The lady that helped me get connected was Sikelelwa Duba (Sike) and she was so friendly and very helpful. She ensured everything was connected, working like it should and that I was happy before she ended the call. I give her a rating of 10/10. :)

reviews.tvSnippet: Simply the best
reviews.text: Simply the best

reviews.tvSnippet: The fibre lines have been intermittent. Today all their clients have authentication issues. Many of us pay exorbitant prices for fibre so we can work online. Now we can't work. Also we have to spend hundreds more on back up. Why are we paying such high fees just to have to spend all our money on back up internet? Not only do we lose out on income we get fined if we cannot carry out our duties. This irregularity is becoming a regular occurrence. All that they can say is apologies. How is that going to help us who are struggling to get money in? Edit: It's back up but when will it just decide to randomly have issues again as it does USELESS service. I have to do my work. Third time in two days it goes down. Clean up your act we pay too much for such uselessness.Tired of pathetic service. I called four times today totalling ¬≥ and a half hours. No one could help me. They said frogfoot then frogfoot days Axxess now it's Eastern Cape. I lost out on income. Axxess should give clients discounts or reduced rates. Apologies don't cut it when your livelihood is on the line.
